item.title: OpenAI makes ChatGPT available for phone chats
item.description: OpenAI on Wednesday rolled out a new way to talk to its viral chatbot: 1-800-CHATGPT.

item.title: Why Wall Street's S&P 500 forecast for 2025 is likely to be 'way off'
item.description: "A paradox exists in equity markets: Average returns do not occur often," said Juan Correa of BCA Research.

item.title: Stocks making the biggest moves midday: Nvidia, Ollie's Bargain Outlet, Birkenstock, Disney and more
item.description: These are the stocks posting the largest moves in midday trading.

item.title: Stellantis further delays electric Ram pickup to prioritize plug-in 'EREV' model
item.description: Stellantis said Wednesday it will further delay an all-electric Ram pickup from next year until 2026.

item.title: AMD invests in GPU cloud provider Vultr at $3.5 billion valuation
item.description: AMD's investment in Vultr comes after Nvidia backed GPU startup CoreWeave.
